titleStmt.title: A proclamation for adjourning the General Assembly of this church, to the seventeenth of December next, 1695.
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Privy Council.
Scotland. Sovereign (1694-1702 : William II)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the heirs and successors of Andrew Anderson, Printer to the Kings most excellent Majesty,

notesStmt.note: Royal arms at head of text; initial letter.
Dated: Given under Our Signet at Edinburgh, the seventh day of February, and of Our Reign the seventh year.
Signed: Gilb. Eliot, Cls. Sti. Concilii.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.

person.persName: the heirs and successors of Andrew Anderson
